I am a Licensed Professsional Counselor who operates from an eclectic perspective. I have a skilled background in working with individuals deadling with many different mental health and substance abuse issues. I consider myself to be solutions focused and strategic in my approach. Altough eclectic, I am grounded in the CBT and DBT models.
